name: WP Ticket Ultra Help Desk & Support Plugin
author: WP Ticket Ultra

sections.description:
WP Ticket Ultra offers a great suite of features that will help you to offer Top-Notch Customer Support.

This plugin has been developed for people that need to improve their support services. We know how hard it can be to offer high-quality support to your clients. A public forum might be a good option; however, this often leads to bigger problems when you are trying to support a growing business. We’ve gone through this experience, and that’s why we developed WP Tickets Ultra. This plugin has helped us a lot, and it will drastically improve your client relationships and increase your overall profits.

KEY FEATURES

  • SMTP Email Sending
  • Custom Message On Weekends
  • Staff Backend
  • Tickets Notification Rules
  • Replies Notification Rules
  • Assign Ticket Owner
  • Custom Email Subject Structure
  • Custom Priorities
  • Maximum Open Tickets Limit
  • Unlimited Products
  • Unlimited Departments
  • Clients Management
  • Clients Backend
  • Email Notification Templates
  • Advanced Admin Panel
  • Terms & Conditions

Read about all of the plugin’s features at WP Ticket Ultra

USEFUL LINKS

  • Getting Started Guide
  • How Do Staff Members Create Tickets?
  • How Do Client Create Tickets?
  • How Do Admins Create Tickets?

PAID EXTENSIONS

WP Ticket Ultra has a range of extensions that allow you to extend the power of the plugin.

FREE EXTENSIONS

  • – With this add-on you will be able to add Google’s secure and user friendly reCaptcha verification in order to avoid bot spam registrations.
sections.installation:
1. Upload wp-ticket-ultra to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
sections.faq:
Is there an online documentation?

Yes, http://docs.wpticketsultra.com/

Do you offer free support?

Yes, https://wpticketsultra.com/contact.php

Do you offer a PRO version?

Yes, https://wpticketsultra.com/compare-packages.php
sections.changelog:
1.0.5

  • Improvements – WP Tickets Ultra Pro has been rebuilt. It has many great features

1.0.4

  • Improvements for new WP version 5.2.x

1.0.0

  • Initial release

short_description: Powerful Help-Desk plugin for wordpress with very usefull features.
